Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient presents with Body Aches for 3 weeks. pt is a 69 yo white female. o:Height 61 in, Weight 121 lbs, Temperature 99.2 F, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 18 a:Rheumatoid Arthritis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed ibuprofen - 800 mg up to 3x day, and ordered ESR.

s:70 year old f retired presents with Body Aches. she consumes 2 drinks per night she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life o:Height 60 in, Weight 118 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 16 a:Rheumatoid Arthritis p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed acetaminophen - 650 mg up to 4x day, and ordered ESR.
